name: 9 × Effing Monster Hunters!
description:
Play Effing Monster Hunters but 9 times and at the same time!

With 9 times as many bigotted assholes!

This silly hack is a demonstration of what you can do with Multi-Bitsy, a bitsy hack I made.

Link to Multi-Bitsy: https://switch-b.itch.io/multi-bitsy

Original game (Effing Monster Hunters): https://switch-b.itch.io/effing-monster-hunters

note: I experienced slowdowns with Firefox. Responsiveness might change depending on which browser you're using.
